org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.akka

类 AkkaRpcActor<T extends RpcEndpoint & RpcGateway>

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.rpc.akka.AkkaRpcActor<T>
  • 类型参数:
    T - Type of the RpcEndpoint
    所有已实现的接口:
    akka.actor.Actor
    直接已知子类:
    FencedAkkaRpcActor

    class AkkaRpcActor<T extends RpcEndpoint & RpcGateway>
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    Akka rpc actor which receives LocalRpcInvocation, RunAsync and CallAsync Processing messages.

    The LocalRpcInvocation designates a rpc and is dispatched to the given RpcEndpoint instance.

    The RunAsync and CallAsync messages contain executable code which is executed in the context of the actor thread.

    The Processing message controls the processing behaviour of the akka rpc actor. A Processing.START starts processing incoming messages. A Processing.STOP message stops processing messages. All messages which arrive when the processing is stopped, will be discarded.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • handleMessage

        protected void handleMessage(java.lang.Object message)

      • handleRpcInvocation

        private void handleRpcInvocation(RpcInvocation rpcInvocation)
        Handle rpc invocations by looking up the rpc method on the rpc endpoint and calling this method with the provided method arguments. If the method has a return value, it is returned to the sender of the call.
        参数:
        rpcInvocation - Rpc invocation message

      • handleCallAsync

        private void handleCallAsync(CallAsync callAsync)
        Handle asynchronous Callable. This method simply executes the given Callable in the context of the actor thread.
        参数:
        callAsync - Call async message

      • handleRunAsync

        private void handleRunAsync(RunAsync runAsync)
        Handle asynchronous Runnable. This method simply executes the given Runnable in the context of the actor thread.
        参数:
        runAsync - Run async message

      • lookupRpcMethod

        private java.lang.reflect.Method lookupRpcMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                                                 java.lang.Class<?>[] parameterTypes)
                                          throws java.lang.NoSuchMethodException
        Look up the rpc method on the given RpcEndpoint instance.
        参数:
        methodName - Name of the method
        parameterTypes - Parameter types of the method
        返回:
        Method of the rpc endpoint
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - Thrown if the method with the given name and parameter types cannot be found at the rpc endpoint

      • sendErrorIfSender

        protected void sendErrorIfSender(java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        Send throwable to sender if the sender is specified.
        参数:
        throwable - to send to the sender
